title: This week on Uncanny Valley, we do a deep dive on Open AI’s Sam Altman.
content: Uncanny Valley is WIRED's show about the people, power, and influence of Silicon Valley. Sam Altman is the CEO and one of the founders of OpenAI, the generative AI company that launched ChatGPT about two years ago. This week, we do a deep dive on Altman, from his Midwest roots to his early startup days, and his time in venture capital.
author: Lauren Goode, Michael Calore, Zoë Schiffer
